title: Ticket #1588: condor_stats output needs sorting
description:
The output of condor_stats changes order--specifically the location of the Total line, if any) a lot due to being emitted in hash table order (ultimately because it was saved in hash table order in the view history file). This annoys various users of Condor--see the rust ticket.

So, the fix would be to impose an ordering upon the output which makes sense for the output queried and also to print Total --if it exists, last. Printing out Total last would make this tool more inline with the rest of Condor's tools.

Now, given all of the above, the output of condor_stats royally sucks and much could be done to improve it as a general thing....

In addition, the rust user states: 

Only to remind, as you are suggesting that "if Total line is present it will
be emitted at the bottom of the output",  Condor View must be also reviewed
to put the Total line on top line of the web page generated by
make_machine_stats script because the default graph corresponds to the
Total informations as in this case is the best presentation option.
